To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private IchimokuKinkoHyo _ichimoku;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_ichimoku = ICHIMOKU(symbol, tenkanPeriod, kijunPeriod, senkouAPeriod, senkouBPeriod, senkouADelayPeriod, senkouBDelayPeriod);

// In OnData()
if (_ichimoku.IsReady)
{
    var tenkan = _ichimoku.Tenkan.Value;
    var kijun = _ichimoku.Kijun.Value;
    var senkouA = _ichimoku.SenkouA.Value;
    var senkouB = _ichimoku.SenkouB.Value;
    var chikou = _ichimoku.Chikou.Value;
    var tenkanMaximum = _ichimoku.TenkanMaximum.Value;
    var tenkanMinimum = _ichimoku.TenkanMinimum.Value;
    var kijunMaximum = _ichimoku.KijunMaximum.Value;
    var kijunMinimum = _ichimoku.KijunMinimum.Value;
    var senkouBMaximum = _ichimoku.SenkouBMaximum.Value;
    var senkouBMinimum = _ichimoku.SenkouBMinimum.Value;
    var delayedTenkanSenkouA = _ichimoku.DelayedTenkanSenkouA.Value;
    var delayedKijunSenkouA = _ichimoku.DelayedKijunSenkouA.Value;
    var delayedMaximumSenkouB = _ichimoku.DelayedMaximumSenkouB.Value;
    var delayedMinimumSenkouB = _ichimoku.DelayedMinimumSenkouB.Value;
    var current = _ichimoku.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.ichimoku = self.ICHIMOKU(symbol, tenkanPeriod, kijunPeriod, senkouAPeriod, senkouBPeriod, senkouADelayPeriod, senkouBDelayPeriod)

# In OnData()
if self.ichimoku.IsReady:
    tenkan = self.ichimoku.Tenkan.Value
    kijun = self.ichimoku.Kijun.Value
    senkou_a = self.ichimoku.SenkouA.Value
    senkou_b = self.ichimoku.SenkouB.Value
    chikou = self.ichimoku.Chikou.Value
    tenkan_maximum = self.ichimoku.TenkanMaximum.Value
    tenkan_minimum = self.ichimoku.TenkanMinimum.Value
    kijun_maximum = self.ichimoku.KijunMaximum.Value
    kijun_minimum = self.ichimoku.KijunMinimum.Value
    senkou_b_maximum = self.ichimoku.SenkouBMaximum.Value
    senkou_b_minimum = self.ichimoku.SenkouBMinimum.Value
    delayed_tenkan_senkou_a = self.ichimoku.DelayedTenkanSenkouA.Value
    delayed_kijun_senkou_a = self.ichimoku.DelayedKijunSenkouA.Value
    delayed_maximum_senkou_b = self.ichimoku.DelayedMaximumSenkouB.Value
    delayed_minimum_senkou_b = self.ichimoku.DelayedMinimumSenkouB.Value
    current = self.ichimoku.Current.Value
